attributes.action: To allow furlough to people employed in December 2020.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to allow people employed in December 2020 to be eligible for furlough pay otherwise it's not fair.

There is alot of people who were employed in December and alot of them were the result in losing jobs because of the lockdown.
